title: Asking for Directions
description: Lucy talks about asking people for directions in the city.
speaker: Lucy
text: Today, I want to talk about asking for directions.
Sometimes, I am lost in the city.
I ask, "Where is the bus stop?"
They say, "Turn left or turn right."
I listen carefully and say thank you.
Now I know where to go.

questions.q: Why does Lucy ask for directions?
